The Tagalog: language caption of the photo translates to English, stating that the British submarine is ready to fire missiles at Iran in case of war, with the support of America.
A reverse image search on Google found t: showing a US missile test off the coast of Southern California on June 27, 2018.
The UK government: s response to the US killing of Soleimani contradicts the claim made in the misleading post, as they called for de-escalation and stated that further conflict is not in their interests.
